original_jd:
Job Description-

This role will blend business acumen with technical proficiency, requiring the ability to understand complex business processes and translate them into effective system configurations. You will be a key player in ensuring our systems accurately reflect business needs and operate efficiently. This position will focus heavily on the developing new processes with technical solutions with the vehicle configuration space. The position will utilize ML and AI to quickly develop solutions.

 • Collaborate with stakeholders across various departments to understand business needs, gather detailed requirements, and document them clearly and concisely using various techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows). 

• Translate business requirements into technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend. This includes, but is not limited to:

 • Developing and maintaining configuration specifications.

 • Creating and modifying data mappings and integrations.

 • Implementing and testing new configurations.

 • Troubleshooting and resolving configuration-related issues. 

• Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement. This may involve querying databases, generating reports, and visualizing data using appropriate tools. 

• Identify opportunities to streamline business processes and improve system efficiency through configuration changes and best practices. 

• Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected. Participate in user acceptance testing (UAT). 

• Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps. 

• Work closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and ongoing support of system configurations.

Skills Required:

-Strong analytical and problem-solving skills. -Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills. -Ability to translate complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences.

Skills Preferred:

-Java experience -SQL experience

Experience Required:

-ML experience and implementation experience

Experience Preferred:

-Experience with Agile methodologies is a plus. -Experience with vehicle configuration is a plus.
enhanced_versions:
Role Overview:
This role is a critical bridge between business operations and technical implementation, requiring a unique blend of business acumen and technical proficiency. As a key member of the team, you will be responsible for understanding complex business processes and translating them into effective system configurations that drive efficiency and accuracy. Your focus will be on developing new processes and solutions within the vehicle configuration space, leveraging machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) technologies to quickly deliver impactful results.

Key Responsibilities:
- Collaborate closely with stakeholders across various departments to gather detailed business requirements and document them using industry-standard techniques such as user stories, use cases, and process flows.
- Translate business requirements into technical configurations within the organization's core [mention specific system] backend, including developing and maintaining configuration specifications, creating and modifying data mappings and integrations, implementing and testing new configurations, and troubleshooting/resolving configuration-related issues.
- Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and opportunities for improvement, utilizing querying, reporting, and data visualization tools as needed.
- Recommend and implement process optimization strategies through configuration changes and the adoption of industry best practices.
- Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected, and actively participate in user acceptance testing (UAT).
- Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps to support ongoing operations and future enhancements.
- Work collaboratively with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and continuous improvement of system configurations.

Required Skills:
- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills to identify and address complex business challenges
- Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration abilities to effectively liaise with technical and non-technical stakeholders
- Proficiency in translating complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences

Preferred Skills:
- Hands-on experience with Java programming language
- Expertise in SQL and database management

Required Experience:
- Demonstrable experience in implementing and optimizing machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) solutions
- Track record of successful configuration management and implementation within complex enterprise systems

Preferred Experience:
- Familiarity with Agile methodologies and their application in a fast-paced, technology-driven environment
- Prior experience working in the vehicle configuration domain

Tools & Technologies:
- [Mention specific system] backend configuration tools
- Data querying and reporting tools (e.g., SQL, Tableau, Power BI)
- Collaboration and documentation tools (e.g., Jira, Confluence, Google Suite)

Work Environment & Expectations:
- Collaborative, cross-functional team environment with regular stakeholder engagement
- Ability to work on multiple projects and priorities simultaneously, with a focus on delivering high-quality results
- Willingness to adapt to changing business requirements and technology advancements

Role Overview:
This is a unique opportunity to leverage your business acumen and technical expertise to drive innovation and efficiency within the vehicle configuration domain. As a key member of the team, you will be responsible for bridging the gap between complex business processes and the technical implementation of solutions. Your primary focus will be on developing new processes and leveraging cutting-edge technologies, such as machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI), to deliver impactful and scalable results.

Key Responsibilities:
- Engage with stakeholders across various departments to thoroughly understand their business needs, gather detailed requirements, and document them using industry-standard techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows).
- Translate the gathered business requirements into robust technical configurations within the organization's [mention specific system] backend, including developing and maintaining configuration specifications, creating and modifying data mappings and integrations, implementing and testing new configurations, and troubleshooting/resolving any configuration-related issues.
- Analyze existing data to identify areas for improvement, detect inefficiencies, and uncover valuable insights that can drive process optimization strategies.
- Leverage your technical expertise to recommend and implement configuration changes and best practices that streamline business operations and enhance system efficiency.
- Participate actively in the user acceptance testing (UAT) process to ensure configurations meet the defined requirements and function as expected.
- Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps to support ongoing operations and enable knowledge transfer.
- Collaborate closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and continuous improvement of the system configurations.

Required Skills:
- Exceptional analytical and problem-solving abilities to tackle complex business challenges
- Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills to effectively liaise with technical and non-technical stakeholders
- Proficiency in translating complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences

Preferred Skills:
- Hands-on experience with Java programming language
- Expertise in SQL and database management

Required Experience:
- Proven track record of implementing and optimizing machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) solutions within enterprise-level systems
- Successful experience in configuration management and implementation in complex business environments

Preferred Experience:
- Familiarity with Agile methodologies and their application in a fast-paced, technology-driven environment
- Prior experience working in the vehicle configuration domain

Tools & Technologies:
- [Mention specific system] backend configuration tools
- Data querying and reporting tools (e.g., SQL, Tableau, Power BI)
- Collaboration and documentation tools (e.g., Jira, Confluence, Google Suite)

Work Environment & Expectations:
- Collaborative, cross-functional team environment with regular stakeholder engagement
- Ability to work on multiple projects and priorities simultaneously, with a focus on delivering high-quality results
- Willingness to adapt to changing business requirements and technology advancements
